name: claude-code-architect-copilot
tagline: Architecture-first AI development copilot with intelligent memory and specialized domain expertise
description: Claude Code plugin with 12 specialized agents powered by Sonnet 4.5. Includes Memory Bank integration for cross-session context, Databricks/Unity Catalog expertise, GenAI/ML workflows, and security-focused code review. Agents activate automatically via keywords and file patterns for seamless, proactive assistance.
